name: Legendary Mosaics: The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat
summary: Legendary Mosaics - The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat invites you on a whimsical puzzle adventure. Something isn't right in the Enchanted Forest. A sinister spell has been cast by the Wicked Wizard, covering everything in eternal darkness. Team up with a cat and Dwarf duo and explore the depths of the forest! Save the fairies in Legendary Mosaics - The Dwarf and the Terrible Cat.
